Reviews.Title: Great buy!
Reviews.Author: P & M "P & M"
Reviews.Content: I was looking for an inexpensive camera to replace the one my dog chewed up.  This fit the bill perfectly.  It is high quality and like new.  I am very pleased.

Reviews.Title: GOOD VALUE FOR MONEY
Reviews.Author: Andrew
Reviews.Content: All right as far as it goes. Got it for my wife and she likes it, but it's a bit of a toy and I can't take a camera seriously which uses throwaway batteries.It is easy to use but the colours are nothing spectacular, the response time is slow by today's standards.

Reviews.Title: A fun easy to use camera.
Reviews.Author: Lisa Limon "Exercise fanatic"
Reviews.Content: The camera is really fun and easy to use.  It is sleek and doesn't take up much room to carry along anytime you want to have it available.  For the cost, it is definately worth it.

ProductInfo.Features:
10.0-megapixel CCD captures enough detail for photo-quality 18 x 24-inch prints
3x optical zoom; 2.4-inch LCD screen
Advanced Face Recognition technology; Smile Capture and Blink Detection
Digital Panorama mode
34 MB internal memory; capture images to SD/SDHC memory cards (not included)
ProductInfo.Name: Pentax Optio E70 10MP Digital Camera with 3x Optical Zoom and 2.4 inch LCD (Dark Blue)
